name: Ni Order Filter For WooCommerce
author: anzia

sections.description:
Experience enhanced order management with the powerful “Order Filter for WooCommerce” plugin. This plugin provides a seamless solution for filtering admin orders based on various criteria, including billing country, payment method, order product, order tax, and order shipping. Upon activation, the plugin adds five convenient dropdown menus to the admin order page, allowing you to quickly access the specific information you need.

With the “Order Filter for WooCommerce” plugin, finding orders based on billing country is a breeze. Simply select the desired country from the dropdown menu, and the plugin will instantly display orders associated with that location. This feature is particularly useful for managing international orders and catering to customers in specific regions.

You can also filter orders based on the payment method used by customers. By selecting a payment method from the dropdown, you can easily track and analyze orders made through different payment gateways, gaining valuable insights into your customers’ preferred payment options.

Efficiently manage orders by filtering them according to specific products. With the order product dropdown, you can quickly identify and review orders related to specific items or product categories. This functionality simplifies inventory management and enables you to focus on products that require immediate attention.

Additionally, the plugin allows you to filter orders based on tax and shipping information. By selecting a tax rate or shipping method from the dropdown menus, you can easily access orders with specific tax settings or shipping requirements. This enables you to handle tax-related queries and track orders based on their shipping preferences effectively.

Streamline your admin order management process with the “Order Filter for WooCommerce” plugin. Gain quick access to essential order information by utilizing the convenient dropdown menus provided. Improve efficiency, track orders more effectively, and deliver outstanding customer service with this essential plugin.

Admin order filter/search

  • Billing country search or filter
  • Payment method search or filter
  • Order product search or filter
  • Order tax search or filter
  • Order shipping search or filter

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

Users are fully responsible for their own use.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni Order Filter For WooCommerce” plugin from admin panel.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email:support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.

  • Tested: Compatible With WooCommerce 8.3.1

  • Tested: Compatible With WordPress 6.1.1

  • Tested: Compatible With WordPress 6.0.1

version 1.0.2 -26-December-2021

  • Tested: Compatible With WooCommerce 6.0.0
  • Tested: Compatible With WordPress 5.8.2
  • BugFix: Fixed country filter

version 1.0.1 -09-September-2021

  • Tested: Compatible With WooCommerce 5.6.0
  • Tested: Compatible With WordPress 5.8.1

version 1.0.0

  • Initial release
sections.screenshots: 1. Dashboard shows country map and key country sale indicator
